cu.explanation_en: Setting tracking_area_code to -1 (must be non-negative) will cause tracking area configuration failure and prevent network registration.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSymbols to 15 (valid range 0-13) will cause TDD configuration validation failure and prevent downlink symbol allocation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSymbols 設定為 15（有效範圍 0-13）會導致 TDD 配置驗證失敗，並阻止下行鏈路符號分配。
